data.title: first time dining in!
data.text: this was my first time dining in at this very convenient located restaurant.  I believe it has changed ownership and they have upgraded, there is plenty of seating and specials are really good.  I would recommend anything on the menu.  I have had most everything offered.  in the past I have always got it to go, but I really liked the ambiance and the "everybody knows your name" vibe!

data.title: Best Chicken Salad in town.
data.text: Let's do Lunch has the best chicken salad that I have ever had. I usually get the trio....chicken salad, cornbread salad,, & strawberry pretzel salad. TO DIE FOR!

owner_response.author: decatur2015, Owner at Let's Do Lunch, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for the review and for having lunch with us. We appreciate your time and hope to see you again soon!
Debra Hewitt
Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Quick, good, inexpensive!
data.text: This small restaurant doesn't look like much on the outside, but that's deceiving!  A great place for a quick lunch, Let's Do Lunch is clean and inviting, with lots of local art on the walls.  Today, I wanted something light, and the Mandarin Salad was just perfect.  With feta cheese!  Would never have thought to add feta to a Mandarin salad, but it was great.  I was barely able to avoid the temptation of pineapple upside-down cake, but succeeded.  Do lunch at Let's Do Lunch - you will not be disappointed.

owner_response.author: decatur2015, Owner at Let's Do Lunch, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for joining us for lunch and for reviewing us. We appreciate you taking time out of your schedule to write a review. We are thrilled you enjoy dining with us and hope to see you again soon!
Debra Hewitt
Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, lovely staff!
data.text: My wife and I love to have lunch together at this great little restaurant. It really is one of Decatur's hidden gems. Go for the grilled Pamento Cheese sandwich with Bacon and Tomato. It's delicious!

data.text: Looking for that little place off the beaten path with amazing food and a pleasant atmosphere.,we'll here it is!!!. The food was so amazing. You got to hit them up for lunch. But don't wait too late in the day,the food is prepared fresh,so it doesn't last long.

data.title: Really good lunch!!!!
data.text: Went here for lunch with my cousins. We had the chicken salad. All breads are freshly made. The chicken salad was blended just right. We all had different sides and each one was very good. Very friendly people working here and food came out fast. Can't wait to go back.

data.title: Great Food!
data.text: I thought this place was closed but no it up and running still.  The chicken salad and pretzel salad was still great.  The new owner is wonderful and really nice.  I will continue to support this great business.

data.title: You'll feel welcome here!
data.text: Quaint little lunch place with a homey feel, and delicious food to boot!  My husband and I both enjoyed our meals.  The Egg and Chicken Salads were tasty and the accompanying Pumpkin Bread was yummy!  Didn't have dessert but the Pepsi cake was very tempting!  Not far from Huntsville International Airport.

data.title: The Local Touch Shows
data.text:
This a long time favorite local lunch shop. Located just off busy 6th Ave. on Holly St. - across from Lucky's Supermarket. The food is homemade (including the breads) and is delicious. Service is prompt - order and pay at the counter and they bring the food to you at your table. The sandwiches are made after you order - no sitting under heat lamps here. The restaurant is small, very clean and bright. 
Don't miss the tuna or chicken salad sandwiches on sourdough. They feature a different dessert each day but my can't get past the strawberry pretzel salad. The poulet is a favorite of many.
They also do takeout and catering. Highly recommended.

owner_response.author: decatur2015, Owner at Let's Do Lunch, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Debra Hewitt

data.title: Chicken Salad is great!
data.text:
I stopped in to Let's Do Lunch today for a take out lunch and asked the staff to give me a couple of their top selling items.  I had the chicken salad sandwich on sourdough, pretzel salad and cornbread salad as sides.  Loved the sourdough bread from chicken salad sandwich enough that I called a few friends to make  plans to get there again soon.
Very friendly restaurant with a clean dining area that is open for lunch only!

data.title: Great Lunch!
data.text: So impressed with this delightful luncheon restaurant. I have dined here several times and never been disappointed.  Everything on the menu is fresh made each day down to the homemade breads including choices such as sourdough, wheat & white. I especially like Fridays when Chicken Poulet is featured. The sides are always difficult decisions for me to make as I like all of them. I guess I must say my favorite is Cornbread Salad, but Strawberry Pretzel salad and Grape Salad run a close second! I feel like I am eating more healthy when I dine here.  The atmosphere is so pleasant with local artist work displayed on the walls and a book nook offered for reading relaxation. I do want to point out also that the servers are all so kind and caring. I will continue to be a loyal customer. Love it!

owner_response.author: decatur2015, Owner at Let's Do Lunch, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for taking time to write a review of Let's Do Lunch. I appreciate your detail in the review. Look forward to seeing you again soon:)

Debra Hewitt, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.text: My wife and I always enjoy visiting on Senior Day; Especially when they have my favorite coconut cake. The food is always fresh. All of the sandwiches and sides are made fresh daily.

data.title: Simply amazing
data.text: Let's Do Lunch...where do I even begin? Well, to simply put it, it is the most inviting and relaxing restaurant in Decatur, Alabama. You walk in, and you see two walls covered in hand painted artwork made by various people in the town. How cool is that? You can tell that the  owner is very passionate about the business because she is always working hard trying to accommodate every customer with any desire they want! You have to try the Poulet when you go! Because it is so good, it sells out quickly so you might want to go early! Also, the various sandwiches they have every day with handmade bread definitely sets it apart from the rest! You also have to try the handmade fruit tea and desserts!!!! Good thing distance limits me to where I cannot go all of the time because I would surely gain too many unwanted pounds. Strawberry pretzel, rocky road brownies, and the white chocolate cookies are just a few of my favorites!!! Can you tell that this is one of my favorite restaurants?? The only thing left I could say is that you must go and try it for yourself. They will make sure you are very well taken care of, and once you take the first bite of your sandwich, Poulet, or chicken salad you'll definitely realize why I rave so much about this place! So if you're anywhere near the Decatur area, I would definitely recommend stopping by Let's Do Lunch and getting a one of a kind experience! Thanks so much Let's Do Lunch for being so welcoming and family friendly! It is surely appreciated!

owner_response.author: decatur2015, Owner at Let's Do Lunch, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
